58b643bd-9260-4f87-89e6-3acb157e10bc.title: What is React?
58b643bd-9260-4f87-89e6-3acb157e10bc.description: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

55afc9fb-c3e8-4a1d-af9b-2a8c0308a4ba.title: How does useState work?
55afc9fb-c3e8-4a1d-af9b-2a8c0308a4ba.description: useState is a Hook that allows you to add state to functional components.

85d4f6cc-2c65-42c5-948e-959268a2521f.title: What is a component?
85d4f6cc-2c65-42c5-948e-959268a2521f.description: A component is a reusable piece of UI in React.
